function.name: save_to_json
function.description: Saves JSON data (string, dict, or list) to a .json file in the outputs directory. Allows case-insensitive '.json' extension.

json_input.description: JSON content to save as a string. Python code also accepts dict or list and normalizes internally.

file_name.description: Filename to save the JSON as (must end with '.json', case-insensitive).
